code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import{persistStore,persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import rootReducer from'./reducers/index';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage};var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);export var store=createStore(rootReducer,{},compose(applyMiddleware(thunk),window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__()));export var persistor=persistStore(store);export default{store:store};// export default { store, persistor }
